title: Grind SEO
description:
Rank Higher IN SERPS With 5000+ High-Quality DIY Backlinks. Grind SEO is the simplest way to build backlinks without relying on expensive automated tools or agencies. We provide an interactive dashboard with a curated list of 5k+ websites to create backlinks.

We’re offering Product Hunt users a special 50% off (on top of 42% off on higher-tier plans) as a thank-you for being here. Just use code: HUNT50
